The whole world supported the Sri Lankan Army because of the countless brutality committed by the cannibalistic terrorist organization ‚Äì LTTE against innocent civilians including Tamil Hindus, Tamil Muslims, Sinhalese etc. LTTE wanted a country with a few Tamil Hindu Casts. LTTE never showed any respect to any kind of international laws and they brutally massacred all the PoWs. So, a big salute to the Sri Lankan Govt and its Army.

At the same time, now the terrorist Budhists also started attacks against minorities including Tamils, Muslims etc. they spread hatred against all the sects and this reveals the terrible, controversial side of Political Budhism which has come out throughout the history. On behalf of peace lovers, WE REQUEST THE SRI LANKAN GOVERNMENT TO ROOT OUT AND ERADICATE ANY ELEMENT OF HATRED SPREADERS from the Island Nation.

comments.comment:
Tamils and Muslims lived under Sinhala Buddhist kings for centuries. Sinhalese kings built Hindu Temples for Hindus and Muslims populated the coastal areas but what happened?
When Sri Lankans started demanding more freedom British divided us. When they finally allowed us elect our representatives  Soulbury and  Donoughmore made sure that Tamils ,Muslims and Sinhalese would send their representatives separately so that Sri Lankans would remain too divided to challenge the rule of the british.
While we managed to unite and take our independence we still have Muslim Congress ,Hela Urumaya ,Tamil Nation Alliance etc. We need to work harder so we can finally remove the legacy of White Imperialism forever but we can't do it with the European ideologies like the "Superior Race" nonsense.
comments.author: Ragnarok

Muslims they are the one who want to separate from our culture ,they are the one who destroying our ancient temple pagoda etc, sadly no one deeply concern about those thing , Am shame about all sinhala leaders coz no one talk about this simple matter (IF WE ARE IN ONE COUNTRY WHY WE HAVE DIFFERENT LOW,DRESS,FOOD,) Find a solution for this then their want be any problem!

replies.replyComment: Rohan Nissanka oya hithana kothanawath prasna natha  ,, jathiya kiyana  wachana godak oya hithanawa ,,jathiya .,,kiyanne ipadeema , Dan waradhda kothanada ratada,, oya ipadeemada ,, hariyatama me kiyapu tharunoth oya barai ,,, maha bo  maha sa wandana,, kiyala type karanna ruwanwali saya thiyana desanaea ahanna  marunu gaman diwya lokata enna

Theruwan saranai hamuduruwane... Muslim aya eyalage jathiyata adarei wagema apith ape jathiyata adarei..Me prasnaya dura diga yanne Muslim anthawadayak hindai..Hethuwak athath nathath sinhala ayage wairaya eliyata paninna balagena inne... Eaka nowena tanata rajayen wath wada karan na.. Rishad badiurdeen kiyana amathi tamai hama prasnayakma patan gaththe.. minissu athuluwa kubiyek pawa hama sathekma ekai kiyala   ape agama igannuwath,Muslim anthwadiyo  Halal wage prashna lankawata genath sinhala baudda kiyana apith wenama jathiyak vidihata danenna salassuwa.

     Banak ahana welawata hitha niwena bauddayanta  haba jeeweithedi me wage prasna hinda ea iwasseema sanwarakama nathiwenawa.. kama beemenuth bedena anthwadayata vitharai sinhala ayage wairaya.. baudda darshanaya kiyana uthum iganweeme vidihata me kata karana vidiha waradiy kiyala dannawa..Eath anthawadayak hindai anthawadayak athi wela thiyenne..Wairayen wairaya nosan sidey keewath kriyatmaka karanna harima amaruy..minissunge hith enna ennama darunu wenawa...Samahara baudda kiyana apeth ehemai.ea athin api niyama bauddayek wenneth na..eath agamata adarei...pavidi jeewithedi wage newey  hitha sanwara karaganna eka enna ennama amaru dyak wela thiyenne.

   Kotinma keewoth Halal prasnaya tamai godakma ekama rataka sahodarayo wage hitapu minissu 2ta beduwe..   Dan eka digin digatama yanawa..ekai aththa. Sinhala minissu anthawadeeyo kiyala hanwadu gahala pali gaththa kiyala eka visaden na .. Sinhalayage wairaya tawath wadi wena eka vitarai wenne.

   Rizana  bella kapala marapu dawase apita mulu dawasama musala dawasak una.Ea siddiaya dawas ganak yanakan wada dunna.eath kohewath nathi  awu ganak nothibunu anthawadayak lankawata genawa.. Eeakatai samahara sinhala aya akamathi.  

  mama tawama darma desana ahuwe na aniwaryen ahannam. mata danena de vitarai keewe.. Oba wahanse samaga wada kala newei..    Theruwan Saranai.!!
Rohan Nissanka mawa hoyaganna ,,koralayagma saranathissa Tharo kiyala type karanna ,,wathukana,, kiyala type karanna athakota darma desana dekak thiyanawa away ahanna  aniwaryen, t,saranai

jeewath una .athi.kiyala hithunada.paduwe.hitapan.
ponnaya.lankawe.inna.oni nam.dagalala.illan.kanne nathuwa.lankawe ba.a sellan.

Keri thambi huththige putho paaduwe hitapan. Thawath hambayo relak paaduwe innawa neda un pitin aapu kotasak kiyala dena gena. Tho wage huththige puthala thamai lankawath miyenmar thathwayata genna hadanne.
uba pakayada  hukanno paduwe hitapan hukaganne nathiwa

Hukaganne nethuwa hitapan thambiya
Arm akram wesige putha waren hutto
